description: Private-by-default encrypted memory network for AI agents on AT Protocol

stories.title: [#14] Install Vitest and create root config
stories.description: Install vitest as dev dependency and create vitest.config.ts at root. GitHub issue #24.

stories.title: [#14] Create first unit test for identity.ts
stories.description: Write unit tests for packages/core/src/identity.ts. GitHub issue #25.

stories.title: [#14] Create vitest workspace config for monorepo
stories.description: Setup vitest.workspace.ts for the monorepo structure. GitHub issue #26.

stories.title: [#14] Add turbo task for test
stories.description: Add test task to turbo.json pipeline. GitHub issue #27.

stories.title: [#7] Implement generateX25519Keypair
stories.description: Implement X25519 keypair generation in packages/core. TDD: write test first. GitHub issue #28.

stories.title: [#7] Implement generateEd25519Keypair
stories.description: Implement Ed25519 keypair generation in packages/core. TDD: write test first. GitHub issue #29.

stories.title: [#7] Implement exportPublicKey (multibase)
stories.description: Export public keys in multibase format. TDD: write test first. GitHub issue #30.

stories.title: [#7] Implement deriveSharedSecret
stories.description: Implement ECDH shared secret derivation. TDD: write test first. GitHub issue #31.

stories.title: Implement envelope encryption (DEK + encrypt/decrypt)
stories.description: Full envelope encryption: generate DEK, encrypt with KEK, provide encrypt/decrypt functions. TDD: write test first. GitHub issue #8. priority/critical.

stories.title: Create test utilities and fixtures
stories.description: Build test helpers: mock keys, fixture data, assertion utilities. GitHub issue #15.

stories.title: Create D1 schema for encrypted records
stories.description: Define Cloudflare D1 schema for storing encrypted memory records. GitHub issue #9.

stories.title: Implement Pi agent wrapper in packages/agent
stories.description: Wrap Pi agent SDK for use in Durable Objects. GitHub issue #10.

stories.title: Implement EncryptedMemory class in packages/agent
stories.description: EncryptedMemory: store/retrieve encrypted records with automatic key management. GitHub issue #11.

stories.title: Add CI workflow (GitHub Actions)
stories.description: Create .github/workflows/ci.yml: lint, typecheck, test on push/PR. GitHub issue #18.

stories.title: Add pre-commit hooks (lint, typecheck, test)
stories.description: Setup husky + lint-staged for pre-commit validation. GitHub issue #19.
